Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.player

Class PlayerLib

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.player.PlayerLib
public class PlayerLib extends Object
Tiny player library to make player methods easier.

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch)
      Plays a sound to a player.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player to play a sound to.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(org.bukkit.Location location, org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch)
      Plays a sound at provided location.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if world is unloaded.

    • playSound

      Plays a sound at provided location for specific player.
      Parameters:
      player - - PLayer.
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if world is unloaded.

    • playSoundAndCut

      public static void playSoundAndCut(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch, int cutAfter)
      Plays a sound to a player and cuts stops it after certain amount of tick passed.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      cutAfter - - Amount of ticks to stop the sound after.

    • playSoundAndCut

      public static void playSoundAndCut(org.bukkit.Location location, org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch, int cutAfter)
      Plays a sound at a specific location and cuts stops it after certain amount of tick passed.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      cutAfter - - Amount of ticks to stop the sound after.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if world is unloaded.

    • playSoundAndCut

      public static void playSoundAndCut(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location location, org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch, int cutAfter)
      Plays a sound at a specific location for provided player and cuts stops it after certain amount of tick passed.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      cutAfter - - Amount of ticks to stop the sound after.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if world is unloaded.

    • spawnParticle

      public static void spawnParticle(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.Location location, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int amount, double x, double y, double z, float speed)
      Spawns a particle for specific player. Only provided player will see the particle.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      location - - Location.
      particle - - Particle.
      amount - - Amount of particles; Some particles might use this value for size.
      x - - X Offset of the particle.
      y - - Y Offset of the particle.
      z - - Z Offset of the particle.
      speed - - Speed of the particle.
